descriptionHTML:
🎄It’s holiday time!
And your smartwatch needs some holiday spirit too! Put on the Christmas lights and let it snow - this watch face is a great addition to already so sweet and heart-warming season.

Two different styles, carefully crafted to look great on any wrist and save battery with smart ambient modes.

❄️Main features:
- Two different themes (Christmas, Santa’s Stuck);
- Christmas lights animation;
- Santa & snow animation;
- Special night mode for Christmas theme;
- Smart ambient mode for each theme;
- Displays current day and date.

⌚Is it for me?
Holiday Spirit is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🎅How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Holiday Spirit Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore ⛄
comments: Beautiful watchface for Christmas. Long battery life.
Time and text is not centered. Looks terrible in dim mode. Still one of my faves though. Very festive!

Satisfied now! I bought this watch face hoping to get the garland with the chrismas lights and I am not able to change it from the Santa to the garland....update: I updated my review due to the quick response from the creator. Thank you! I love it!
Nice Night and day mode should flip automatically based on timing or sunset / sunrise. Can this be done developer? Am I missing something?
Huawei watch This designer makes fabtastic designs everyone ive enjoyed and still use
this one is my favorite. I love the lights blink.
